comment_0: The song is about a guy being in a monogamous relationship. His lady knows that he's tempted and might be cheating on her.  "She knows" also refers to a woman who knows that man is with someone else but she doesn't care because she wants him anyway. He also knows he can't keep cheating for too long because is lady will find out.
